chunk: Broccoli recipe Introduce your baby to veggies with this quick and simple purée. Broccoli makes a great finger food too! Age: 6 months or older Prep: 5 mins Cook: 8 mins Portions: 7 Ingredients - 1 medium broccoli – stalks removed, washed and chopped into small chunks (approx 200g) Method Bring a pan of water to the boil, place chopped broccoli florets in the pan and cook until tender, about 8 minutes. Drain, then blend or mash with a fork to get a smooth consistency. If the mixture is too thick, add a little full-fat milk or baby's usual milk. Allow to cool before serving. Freeze any leftover portions in small pots or ice cube trays. Information: Instead of blending, cook for 6 to 8 minutes until soft and serve as a finger food. Weaning tip Vegetables that aren't so sweet, like broccoli, spinach and cauliflower help your baby get
